trans-unit.source: [varLib] Fixed kern merging when a PairPosFormat2 has ClassDef1 with glyphs that are NOT present in the Coverage (1b5e1c4, #939).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]修复了PairPosFormat2具有ClassDef1且其Coverage中不存在的字形（1b5e1c4，＃939）时的合并字距的问题。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Fixed merging GPOS tables from master fonts with different number of
trans-unit.target: [varLib]修复了合并具有不同数量主字体的GPOS表的问题

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Fixed merging PairPos Format1/2 with missing subtables (#1125).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]修复了合并缺少子表的PairPos Format1 / 2（＃1125）。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Fixed merging of class-based kerning. Before, the process could introduce rogue kerning values and variations for random classes against class zero (everything not otherwise classed).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]固定合并基于类的字距调整。以前，该过程可能会针对零类（所有其他未分类的事物）引入流氓字距调整值和随机类的变化。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Fixed merging of multiple PairPosFormat2 subtables (#1411).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]修复了合并多个PairPosFormat2子表（＃1411）的问题。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Fixed non-deterministic ClassDef order with PY3 (f056c12, #927).
[varLib] Fixed regression introduced with 3.8.0 in the calculation of
trans-unit.target: [varLib]在3.8.0的计算中引入了固定回归

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Flatten multiple tail PairPosFormat2 subtables before merging (c55ef525).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]合并前将多个尾部的PairPosFormat2子表展平（c55ef525）。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Implemented building GSUB FeatureVariations table from the
[varLib] Improve support for OpenType 1.8 Variable Fonts:
[varLib] Improved error message when masters’ glyph orders do not match (#1758, #1759).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]当母版的字形顺序不匹配时（＃1758，＃1759），改进了错误消息。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Improved support-resolution algorithm. Previously, the on-axis masters would always cut the space. They don’t anymore. That’s more consistent, and fixes the main issue Erik showed at TYPO Labs 2017. Any varfont built that had an unusual master configuration will change when rebuilt (42bef17, a523a697, https://github.com/googlei18n/fontmake/issues/264).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]改进的支持分辨率算法。以前，轴上的母版通常会削减空间。他们不再。这更加一致，并修复了Erik在TYPO Labs 2017上显示的主要问题。任何具有不寻常的主配置的varfont生成的对象在重建时都会改变（42bef17，a523a697， https：//github.com/googlei18n/fontmake/issues/264） 。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Initialize the avar segment map with required default entries (#1014).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]用必需的默认条目初始化avar分段图（＃1014）。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Make STAT v1.2 and reuse nameIDs from fvar table (#1242).
[varLib] New library to work with OpenType Font Variations.
trans-unit.target: [varLib]与OpenType字体变体一起使用的新库。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Refactored and improved the variation-font-building process.
trans-unit.target: [varLib]重构和改进了变体字体构建过程。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Started generating STAT table (8af4309). Right now it just reflects the axes, and even that with certain limitations: * AxisOrdering is set to the order axes are defined, * Name-table entries are not shared with fvar.
trans-unit.target: [varLib]开始生成STAT表（8af4309）。现在，它仅反映轴，甚至具有某些限制：* AxisOrdering设置为定义轴的顺序，*名称表条目未与fvar共享。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Support generation of CFF2 variable fonts.
[varLib] Take total bounding box into account when resolving model (7ee81c8). If multiple axes have the same range ratio, cut across both (62003f4).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]解析模型（7ee81c8）时，请考虑总边界框。如果多个轴具有相同的范围比，则将两者都切掉（62003f4）。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] The avar table can now contain mapping output values that are greater than OR EQUAL to the preceeding value, as the avar specification allows this.
trans-unit.target: [varLib]由于avar规范允许这样做，因此avar表现在可以包含大于OR EQUAL的输出值到先前值的映射。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] The default STAT table version is now set to 1.1, to improve compatibility with legacy applications (#1413).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]现在将默认STAT表版本设置为1.1，以提高与旧版应用程序的兼容性（＃1413）。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] The errors of the module are now ordered hierarchically below VarLibError. See #1821.
trans-unit.target: [varLib]现在，模块的错误在VarLibError下按层次结构排序。参见＃1821。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Try set of used points instead of all points when testing whether to share points between tuples (#1090).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]在测试是否在元组之间共享点时，请尝试使用一组使用的点而不是所有点（＃1090）。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Use sentinel value -0x8000 (-32768) to ignore post.underlineThickness and post.underlinePosition when generating MVAR deltas (#1449, googlei18n/ufo2ft#308).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]生成MVAR增量时，请使用哨兵值-0x8000（-32768）忽略post.underlineThickness和post.underlinePosition（＃1449，googlei18n / ufo2ft＃308）。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] When filling in the default axis value for a missing location of a source or instance, correctly map the value forward.
trans-unit.target: [varLib]在为源或实例的缺失位置填写默认轴值时，请正确地向前映射该值。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] Work around macOS rendering issue for composites without gvar entry (#1381).
trans-unit.target: [varLib]解决没有gvar条目（＃1381）的组合的macOS渲染问题。

trans-unit.source: [varLib] designspace.load() now returns a dictionary, instead of a tuple, and supports <axes> element (#864); the ‘masters’ item was renamed ‘sources’, like the <sources> element in the designspace document
trans-unit.target: [varLib] designspace.load（）现在返回字典，而不是元组，并支持<axes>元素（＃864）；'masters'项目被重命名为'sources'，就像designspace文档中的<sources>元素一样
[varLib]已修复标准化位置值（8fa2ee1，＃749）时出现的问题

trans-unit.source: [voltLib] Allow passing file-like object to Parser.
trans-unit.target: [voltLib]允许将类似文件的对象传递给解析器。

trans-unit.source: [voltLib] Fixed check for duplicate anchors (#1450). Don’t try to read past the
trans-unit.target: [voltLib]修复了检查重复锚的问题（＃1450）。不要试图阅读过去

trans-unit.source: [voltLib] Fixed parsing glyph groups. Distinguish different PROCESS_MARKS. Accept COMPONENT glyph type.
trans-unit.target: [voltLib]固定解析字形组。区分不同的PROCESS_MARKS。接受COMPONENT字形类型。

trans-unit.source: [voltLib] New library to parse Microsoft VOLT project files.
trans-unit.target: [voltLib]用于解析Microsoft VOLT项目文件的新库。

trans-unit.source: [voltLib] Support writing back abstract syntax tree as VOLT data (#1983).
trans-unit.target: [voltLib]支持将抽象语法树写回VOLT数据（＃1983）。

trans-unit.source: [woff2] Added support for compressing/decompressing WOFF2 fonts with non-transformed
trans-unit.target: [woff2]添加了对使用未转换的WOFF2字体进行压缩/解压缩的支持

trans-unit.source: [xmlWriter] Added context manager to XMLWriter class to autoclose file descriptor on exit (#1290).
trans-unit.target: [xmlWriter]向XMLWriter类添加了上下文管理器，以在退出时自动关闭文件描述符（＃1290）。

trans-unit.source: according to DesignSpace specification update in #1750. Depending on this flag, we generate either an ‘rvrn’ (always processed first) or a ‘rclt’ feature (follows lookup order, therefore last) (#1747, #1625, #1371).
trans-unit.target: 根据＃1750中的DesignSpace规范更新。根据此标志，我们生成“ rvrn”（始终首先处理）或“ rclt”功能（遵循查找顺序，因此是最后一个）（＃1747，＃1625，＃1371）。

trans-unit.source: added cmap format 4 support. Extra: dumps Unicode char names as XML comments!
trans-unit.target: 增加了对cmap格式4的支持。额外的:将Unicode字符名转储为XML注释。
所有参数都是输入文件

trans-unit.source: also add Macintosh (platformID=1) names by default. Added options to
trans-unit.target: 也默认添加Macintosh (platformID=1)名称。添加了选项到
在这种情况下也是如此(#1815)。

trans-unit.source: argument to control the rounding of coordinates (#804, fixes #769).
trans-unit.target: 参数来控制坐标的四舍五入(#804,修正#769)。

trans-unit.source: argument to only build some tables instead of all (#1159, #1163).
trans-unit.target: 参数,只建立一些表,而不是全部(#1159,#1163)。

trans-unit.source: argument. Axis map should be specified in designspace file now. We do not accept nonstandard axes if
trans-unit.target: 参数,现在应该在设计空间文件中指定轴图。现在应该在设计空间文件中指定轴图。我们不接受非标准轴,如果是

trans-unit.target: 属性,如 unified-font-object/ufo-spec#78 所述。在即将发布的UFO规范(非0)小更新之前,读写UFO不会有任何变化(#1786)。

trans-unit.source: attribute in TTX files still showing ‘3.0’ instead of ‘3.1’.
trans-unit.target: TTX文件中的“属性”属性仍显示为“ 3.0”而不是“ 3.1”。

trans-unit.target: 属性,并为源元素提供相应的

trans-unit.target: backport更新到最新的Unicode 12.0版本的Python 2.7和3.x。请注意,如果您使用Python 3.8,则不需要这样做,因为后者已经带有最新的

trans-unit.source: blocks, as the records referenced in
branch. You can read more here and here for the reasons behind this decision.
trans-unit.target: 科。出于此决定的原因，您可以在此处 和此处阅读更多内容。

trans-unit.target: 在PairPos查找中使用break语句;之前这些语句被忽略(#1279,#1300,#1302)。

trans-unit.source: changed “Euro” to “Euro_or_currency” in the Standard Apple Glyph order list, since we cannot tell from the ‘post’ table which is meant. I should probably doublecheck with a Unicode encoding if available. (This does not affect the output!)
trans-unit.target: 在标准Apple Glyph订单列表中将“欧元”更改为“欧元或货币”，因为我们无法从“发布”表中辨别出其含义。如果可能的话，我应该仔细检查Unicode编码。（这不会影响输出！）

trans-unit.target: 类来对一个数组进行数学运算,而

trans-unit.target: 为了适应这种情况,增加了类(#1091)。

trans-unit.source: class, so it can be used in
class, to initialize new descriptor objects using keyword arguments, and at the same time append them to the current document (#1860).
trans-unit.target: 类,使用关键字参数初始化新的描述符对象,同时将它们附加到当前文档中(#1860)。

trans-unit.source: class. This is a shorthand for calling
classes. Make them accept either list of lookups or list of lists of lookups (#1961).
trans-unit.target: 类,让它们接受查找列表或查找列表的列表(#1961)。让它们接受查找列表或查找列表的列表(#1961)。

trans-unit.source: command line tool (#1913, #1920). Ensure all fonttools CLI tools have help documentation (#1948).
trans-unit.target: 命令行工具(#1913,#1920)。确保所有fonttools CLI工具都有帮助文档(#1948)。

trans-unit.source: command to the ‘fonttools’ command-line tool; applies a feature file to a font.
trans-unit.target: 命令到'fonttools'命令行工具；将功能文件应用于字体。

trans-unit.source: compile no longer accepts a directory as input argument. Instead it can parse the new “mini-ttx” format as output by “ttx -s”.
trans-unit.target: 编译不再接受目录作为输入参数。相反，它可以解析“ ttx -s”输出的新“ mini-ttx”格式。
构造函数现在接受一个

trans-unit.source: copy if src has more items. We drop hinting in the subsetter by simply changing ValueFormat, without cleaning up the actual ValueRecords. This was causing assertion error if a variable font was subsetted without hinting and then passed directly to the mutator for instantiation without first it saving to disk.
trans-unit.target: 复制,如果src有更多的项目。我们通过简单地改变ValueFormat来放弃子集器中的提示,而不清理实际的ValueRecords。如果一个变量字体在没有提示的情况下被子集,然后直接传给突变器进行实例化,而不先将其保存到磁盘上,就会导致断言错误。

trans-unit.source: custom exception subclass, raised when an included feature file cannot be found (#1186).
trans-unit.target: 自定义异常子类,当找不到包含的特征文件时引发(#1186)。

trans-unit.source: data from the first region font was incorrecty used for all subsequent fonts. The bug would only affect variable CFF2 fonts with hinting (#1643, #1644). Also, fixed a merging bug when VF masters have no blends or marking glyphs (#1632, #1642).
trans-unit.target: 第一个区域字体的数据被错误地用于所有后续字体。这个错误只影响到带有提示的可变CFF2字体(#1643,#1644)。另外,修正了VF母体没有混合或标记字形时的合并错误(#1632,#1642)。

trans-unit.source: dict. The latter still works but with a pending deprecation warning (#1104).
trans-unit.target: dict。后者仍然可以使用,但有一个等待废弃的警告(#1104)。

trans-unit.source: element is missing. The default master is expected at the intersection of all default values for each axis (#1254, #1255, #1267).
trans-unit.target: 元素缺失。每个轴的所有缺省值的交点处都有缺省主值(#1254,#1255,#1267)。

trans-unit.target: 元素如果为空,则写成一个简单的标签(#819)。

trans-unit.target: 现在,为了构建可变字体(#1224,#1313),需要使用元素。

trans-unit.target: 元素,但尚未在 designspace 读写器中实现 (#1254)。

trans-unit.source: element, with values “first” or “last”, plus other editorial changes to DesignSpace specification. Bumped format version to 4.1 (#1750).
trans-unit.target: 元素，其值为“ first”或“ last”，以及对DesignSpace规范的其他修改。将格式版本更改为4.1（＃1750）。

修复了大部分的可移植性问题

trans-unit.source: flag that may be set when instantiating variable fonts (#1771).
trans-unit.target: 当实例化可变字体时可以设置的标志(#1771)。

trans-unit.source: fontTools is a library for manipulating fonts, written in Python. The project includes the TTX tool, that can convert TrueType and OpenType fonts to and from an XML text format, which is also called TTX. It supports TrueType, OpenType, AFM and to an extent Type 1 and some Mac-specific formats. The project has an MIT open-source licence.
trans-unit.target: fontTools是一个使用Python编写的用于处理字体的库。该项目包括TTX工具，该工具可以将TrueType和OpenType字体与XML文本格式（也称为TTX）相互转换。它支持TrueType，OpenType，AFM，并在某种程度上支持Type 1和某些Mac特定格式。该项目具有MIT开源许可证。

trans-unit.source: parameter, it cannot distinguish between a glyph name containing an hyphen, or a range of glyph names; instead of raising an error, it now interprets them as literal glyph names, while also outputting a logging warning to alert user about the ambiguity (#1768, #1870).
trans-unit.target: 参数,它不能区分包含连字符的字形名,或一系列字形名;现在它没有引发错误,而是将它们解释为字形名,同时输出日志警告,提醒用户注意歧义(#1768,#1870)。

trans-unit.source: to dynamically load version info from a git checkout at import time.
trans-unit.target: 在导入时从git checkout动态加载版本信息。

trans-unit.source: to allow disabling avar mapping: if False (default), the location is mapped using the map element of the axes in designspace file; if True, it is assumed that location is in designspace’s internal space and no mapping is performed (#950, #975).
trans-unit.target: 允许禁用avar映射：如果为False（默认值），则使用设计空间文件中轴的map元素映射位置；如果为True，则假定位置在设计空间的内部空间中，并且不执行任何映射（＃950，＃975）。

trans-unit.source: to compute vertical phantom points; or
to fix round-trip issue when computing bounding boxes of transformed components (#1830).
trans-unit.target: 修正在计算变换组件的边界盒时的往返问题(#1830)。

trans-unit.source: to manipulate contours as a whole rather than segment by segment.
trans-unit.target: 将轮廓作为一个整体来操作,而不是逐段操作。

trans-unit.source: to not do any rounding but simply return
trans-unit.target: 不做任何四舍五入,只返回

trans-unit.source: to round floats to nearest integer towards positive Infinity. This is now used where we deal with visual data like X/Y coordinates, advance widths/heights, variation deltas, and similar (#1274, #1248).
trans-unit.target: 将浮点数舍入到最接近正无穷的整数。现在我们在处理X/Y坐标、前进宽度/高度、变化三角区等可视化数据时使用了这个函数(#1274,#1248)。

trans-unit.source: to use glyph names internally instead of glyph indexes. The old ttx dumps of HVAR/VVAR tables that contain indexes can still be imported (21cbab8, 38a0ffb).
trans-unit.target: 以在内部使用字形名而不是字形索引。包含索引的 HVAR/VVAR 表的旧 ttx 转储仍然可以导入(21cbab8、38a0ffb)。

trans-unit.source: ttDump.py and ttCompile.py don’t silently override files anymore, but ask before doing so. Can be overridden by -f.
trans-unit.target: ttDump.py和ttCompile.py不再以静默方式覆盖文件，但在这样做之前请先进行询问。可以被-f覆盖。

trans-unit.source: ttcompile’s -i options is now called -m (as in “merge”), to avoid clash with dump’s -i.
trans-unit.target: ttcompile的-i选项现在称为-m（如“合并”中所述），以避免与转储的-i冲突。
